value:
$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|Everyone ready? Let's go then!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|This is it. The last battle.
We can't lose here!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ギース,ch02_26_Geese_M_Pirate20,Face|Even if I'm rusty, I still know all
I need to know about being a pirate.
Now's the time for pirates to shine!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|...What he said!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_FM_Pair,Face|I don't really care about festivals,
but I'm a pirate for now...$k$p$nMPID_マークス|As pirates, we must give it our
all—for our crew!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|I can't believe this... How could
we have lost?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ギース,ch02_26_Geese_M_Pirate20,Face|It's not the worst thing. Sure, I was
after that treasure same as you, but
we had fun—even if we didn't win.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|I agree... Plus, seeing us as pirates
put smiles on people's faces for
once, and I'm glad for that.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|Victory may have escaped us, but we
helped bring some excitement to the
festival. A job well done, I'd say.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|...You're right, of course.$k$pEven though you all agreed to follow
my lead, I'm the one who lost focus
on what was really important.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|Yes? Something you'd like to say?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|It's just...I've been wondering...
Are you really a pirate, Brigid?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|Of course I am! I'm daughter to the
leader of the Orgahil Pirates! Pirating
is in my blood.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|I see... You can definitely lead, but
as far as being a pirate, something's
still off. Just a feeling, that's all.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|I suppose that might be worth
considering, from you. In any
case, I'll keep it in mind...$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|...Anyone else hungry? I'm a decent
cook. I'll whip up some chow if that
sounds good to anyone else.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ギース,ch02_26_Geese_M_Pirate20,Face|Not a bad idea. Let's get started!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|Brilliant! Thank you all for...everything
you've done today. I...had fun too.$k$p$Sbs150|
